Offset Printing - Brochure Printing, Book Printing, Calendar

Offset Printing - Applications of Offset Printing

Offset lithography is one of the most common ways of creating printed matter. It is a printing process in which an image is printed on surface through an indirect process. Here image is transferred from plate to the rubber cylinder which in turn transfers the ink to the printing surface. Offset printing ensures high quality image printing and is considered to be a very affordable printing technique. Because of this reason it is a widely employed for printing especially in industries and companies where bulk printing solutions is the requirement.

Advantages with Offset Printing
<ul>
<li>Offset printing can produce much clear and sharper images which is not possible with letterpress method.</li>
<li>Using offset printing large number of materials can be printed in lesser time and through easy printing process.</li>
<li>Offset printing is the cheapest method to produce high quality printing in commercial printing quantities.</li>
<li>In offset printing the density of the colour for the certain areas of the image print can be modified. It is highly possible to adjust the amount of ink on the fountain roller with screw keys. By adjusting the screws the gap between the blade and the fountain roller is altered, leading to the amount of ink applied to the roller to be increased or decreased in certain areas and therefore it possible to print images with different color density variations.</li>
</ul>
Applications of Offset Printing

Because of all these advantages, offset printing is widely used in various commercial printing applications across the world. Brochure printing, book printing and calendar printing are some of the most common applications where offset printing is preferred. Offset printing is widely employed for printing promotional materials like calendars, leaflets, laminate folders, catalogues, flyers, danglers, posters etc. The reason for this is that manufacturers get a superior advantage of lesser costs and the most desired high quality printing apt for their branding and marketing requirements. Apart from promotion materials, offset printing finds its application in the packaging materials printing applications too like <a title="folding cartons" href="http://www.on-linegraphics.com/folding-cartons.html]folding cartons[/url] / Folding boxes printing and <a title="Paper labels" href="http://www.on-linegraphics.com/labels.html]Paper labels[/url] printing. The packaging cartons and labels are very often printed with company logos, pictures or captive text for an attractive appearance and are often required in bulk. Therefore they are mostly developed using offset methods to maintain the quality, quicker and cost effective development needs which is not possible with other printing processes.

Folding Boxes, Paper Labels - Packaging and Storage Media

Folding Boxes - Packaging & Storage Media </p>

<p align="justify]Folding boxes is a good packaging and storage media. High quality materials like hard board, strong plastics are used to manufacture folding boxes. Folding boxes are also known as folding cartons. There is high demand of folding cartons in packaging industries. Pharmaceutical industry, food and FMCG consumer products are the area where folding boxes in various sizes, shape, style are required. Folding box preparation for particular product is a skilled work to define and design the box to make the product attractive for sale. There is a separate division in packaging company to derive the design for folding cartons. It gives a good effect to market the product if the product is wrapped into the effecting box. Folding boxes can give good marketing effect through packaging when they are been prepared from quality paper material, used high quality printing ink to embosse the drawings on the boxes. Low quality inferior ink can damage the product value and brand name. This is the reason that good companies always pay more attention to the product packaging through the professional folding boxes providers. The profession folding cartons provider company have in-house experienced and skilled staff who can understand the client's packaging requirement from scratch and turn their dream of packaging into the reality through their core expertise in drawing and define the size, shape, style, colors and printing method on folding box to make popular the branding of the product.</p>
<p align="justify]Importance of Paper Labels in Packaging Industry </p>
<p align="justify]Paper labels are the labels for bottles, jars, tins or the printed material to stick on the container of the product. These paper labels can be adhesive or non-adhesive. Paper labels play the same role as of folding boxes because it remains stacked to the vessel till the end of the product and visualize and memorize to the buyers on regular usage. Thus the paper labels made from high quality paper material or laminated can last for long and give good marketing effect to purchase the same product frequently to the buyers. Paper labels are used widely in packaging industry. High quality printed labels create good branding of the product. Thus if you are interest you may visit online at - www.on-linegraphics.com to get satisfy your requirements of folding boxes and printed paper labels.</p>

Benefits of Folding Boxes - Folding Cartons, Paper Labels

Benefits of Folding Boxes - Folding Cartons <br>
[/b]Folding boxes are different than normal boxes. Normal boxes are big in the size occupying more space where as folding boxes are thin in size and shape used to package various products like medicines, consumer food products, FMCG products etc. These folding boxes have closing folded lids which can close and fix the box packaging and whenever required can open the box. The same size, shape and molding of the box can put them in structured way on top of the other to create a mass storage of folding boxes and the same products after packaging. Folding capacity of boxes can increase more storage of the products result in high volume of the products can be carried and save the transportation cost. The flat folding of these boxes can save the space for its mass storage and can be folded as on requirements. Good screen printing of the folding boxes to narrate the product for better definition with design and logo. The industrial usage of these folding boxes can make them recyclable for further usage. Many companies in the market providing folding boxes with or without screen printing. </p>
<p>Paper Labels<br>
Paper labels are another important packaging material to prepare the product for packaging and branding. Paper labels can me manufactured as per the products container's size, shape and style to paste paper labels better on the container / product to long last for better promotion. High quality paper materials with lamination, high gloss UV and foil stamping raise the life of paper labels and prevent to tear even after putting high pressure. Printing paper labels is another important aspect to design and paste the paper labels with good and attractive colors can create a good impact on viewers and lure to purchase the product with better finishing of printed paper labels on vessels/container. It needs technological advanced machineries to prepare professionally designed & printed paper labels in bulk production. After manufacturing of paper labels, there must be the quality control division to check the product quality before supplying to the client. Good finishing and quality of paper labels can enhance the market value of products and paper labels and can increase the reputation for creating, industry standard paper labels and can get more orders. Thus if you are looking for this kind of professionally developed folding cartons and paper labels by advanced machineries, you should visit the website - www.on-linegraphics.com where you can get detailed information and knowledge about all industrial packaging and printing materials to get purchase at very reasonable rate.</p>

Application Usage of Folding Cartons, Application Usage of P

Application Usage of Folding Cartons<br>
Diverse format and multiple printing colors make the folding boxes much attractive and interactive provides all information about the product through printing and hold the products in better way for placement and transportation. The main function of the folding boxes is to keep the product container safe, give better identity to the product, make the product attractive and branded etc. Folding boxes are created by packaging service solution providers. High quality paper boards are used to manufacture the folding cartons. Various stages and steps including designing of the material, cutting of the material, folding of the material, and printing etc, are applied to the boxes. When you are talking about the mass production, you need highly advanced technological machineries to generate the bulk production of folding boxes as per the custom requirements. This process also needs technical expertise of skilled professionals to define and design the folding box requirements as per the clients packaging needs to suit the modern look of the product to make it better saleable and branded through the best packaging. Folding box plays an important role in promoting product. Thus never ignore the importance of acceptable look of the folding cartons for product manufacturing comapanies and for buyers. As it plays the same role as advertising your product on market media.</p>
<p>Application Usage of Paper Labels<br>
While visiting any shopping mall, you can see the high consumption of the products, which are having very good labeling. This shows the importance of paper labels in marketing the product. This is the reason that now companies are spending more on attractive look and labeling of the product. Paper label means the simple paper but it has very high commercial and advertising value of your product and company branding. You just name any product like tomato catch-up or coco cola, you will memorize its label first in your mind before the product. Thus paper labels create a visionary look of the product. There are various types of paper labels used for the product labeling based on other packaging of the product like stickers, self adhesive labels, rate stickers etc. Paper labels are the oldest form of product marketing and relatively inexpensive compare to other way of promotion and branding. Paper labels are used by small as well big companies based on types of products. Basically small entrepreneur usage is high of paper labels due to low cost of product. Thus good folding boxes and paper labels are good marketing media for any product.</p>

Cardboard Boxes, Offset Printing

Cardboard boxes<br>
Cardboard boxes are also known as folding boxes and folding cartons. Cardboard boxes are used in packaging industries. It is a good storage material. Cardboard boxes are made up of hard board and plastic materials. Cardboard boxes are used in Pharma industries, food and FMCG consumer products industries. They are available in different size, styles and shapes. Cardboard boxes are skilled work offered by paper and packaging materials provider companies where the experienced professionals design the cardboard boxes to promote the product well in the market with better style and attractive look. High quality paper materials and printing makes the product wrapped in cardboard boxes more attractive and lure the consumers to buy the product. Attractive cardboard boxes for the product fulfill all the requirements of seller for better selling and brand promotion of the product. </p>
<p align="justify]Offset Printing - Benefits of Offset Printing<br>
This is a very common and popular printing method. Majority of the printings are carried out by this method. Through offset printing image and non-image areas are set at one level. Offset printing is also referred as litho offset printing. There are two types of offset printing. Sheet fed and Web fed. Sheet fed offset printing is carried out on a single sheet at a time. Web fed offset printing is carried out on a continuous sheet from the roll as per the required size. Offset printing is a onetime cost of purchasing and installing material, thereafter in low cost one can print the material. Offset printing is used to print books, news papers, calendars, notebooks, periodicals and packaging materials like cardboard boxes, leaflets and other promotional materials to print. Few benefits of offset printing are to embossed high quality images, prompt printing production, longer printing plate life, very cheap to create printed materials compare to other methods of printing. There are other printing methods also used to create high quality image printing like rotogravure printing or photogravure printing.</p>

<p align="justify]Offset printing has become most popular printing method from 1950 onwards. Offset printing quality depends on the types of plates, inks, paper used by the machine. Now day’s offset printing machines are available with various advanced features that continuously increase the speed and plate durability for high quality printing.</p>

Cardboard boxes and Offset Printing - Benefits of Offset Pri

<p align="justify]Offset Printing - Benefits of Offset Printing
This the kind of and popular printing method. Tastes the printings are performed at this method. Through offset printing image and non-image areas are set at one level. Offset printing can also be referred as litho offset printing. There are 2 sorts of offset printing. Sheet fed and Web fed. Sheet fed offset printing is carried out on a single sheet at any given time. Web fed offset printing is completed over a continuous sheet through the roll according to the desired size. Offset printing may be a onetime cost regarding and installing material, thereafter in low cost you can print the material. Offset printing is required to print books, news papers, calendars, notebooks, periodicals and packaging materials like cardboard boxes, leaflets and other promotional materials to print. Few important things about offset printing are to embossed high quality images, prompt printing production, longer printing plate life, cost effective to generate printed materials compare with other methods of printing. Los angeles cpa printing methods also familiar with create good quality image printing like rotogravure printing or photogravure printing.</p>
<p align="justify]Offset printing is becoming most popular printing method from 1950 onwards. Offset printing quality depends upon the sorts of plates, inks, paper made use of by it. Now day’s offset printing machines can be found with some other advanced features that continuously increase the interest rate and plate durability for high-quality printing.</p>

Traditional Offset Printing - Brochure Printing, Book Printi

Advantages of Traditional Offset Printing<br>
Traditional offset printing is done with the help of ink, plates and rollers with a press. In offset printing, the wet ink is placed on the top of each piece of paper. There are other options also available in printing like digital printing which doesn’t use wet ink whereas, a dry, powdery toner and some oil are heated inside the printer to make the images on the paper. The digital print is not as clear as the traditional offset printing. There are some advantages of offset printing over digital printing which are given below:-<br>
Offset Printing proves to be affordable when there are large quantity orders<br>
Offset printing proves to be affordable as it is the cheapest way to print large quantity orders. The initial cost of producing the printing plate makes the unit cost high when there are low quantity orders. But, if the quantity is large, the plate cost is same when the quantity is less. <br>
The image quality is high when offset printing is done<br>
The ink is used while offset printing is done, while in digital printing, the toner is used. So, a better quality printing is achieved while printing paper labels, folding boxes, cardboard boxes etc., as ink is able to create finer lines, richer colour and smaller dots than a toner can do.<br>
Offset printing is versatile<br>
The offset printing is suitable for large variety of products like for printing paper labels, printing promotional material, printing folding boxes, printing calendars, printing laminate folders, printing leaflets, printing books and many more.<br>
Special colors and coatings<br>
While doing digital printing, colors are limited to CMYK, whereas offset printing offers a wide variety of colors including metallic, fluorescent etc. These colors can dramatically change the look of the product packaging or any other promotional material.<br>
Offset printing is renowned for fast turnaround<br>
When it comes to large quantity printing, offset printing is renowned for fast turnaround. The plates used in offset printing considerably take less time to produce and can print large volume of printing than other types of press.

Cardboard Boxes for Packaging Industry

Folding boxes are widely used in various industries for packaging the product. They are referred as different innovative terms as per their industrial applications like cardboard boxes, folding cartons etc. Cardboard boxes are very generic term used for last few decades for traditional packaging industry. In the modern time packaging material have not been only packing tools or materials but it has been defined for branding the product with well structured high quality box and effective offset printing on it make a unique effect of product packing in consumer's mind.</p>
<p align="justify]A separate unique concept of brand development through packaging materials has been placed in the industry. A unique size and style is defined for each product to make it market saleable. Color, shape and specific printing on such cardboard boxes are designed by the experts and skilled marketing professionals. Thus old and traditional cardboard boxes have come up in a new form of designer folding boxes and folding carton as per the corporate or industrial packaging requirements. Cardboard boxes are available in various qualities based on the commercial application. One can find these boxes everywhere like Pharma, food, FMCG, consumer electronics and all the way in packaging usage. Packaging industry is now spreading the wings with professional and customized packing solutions to the corporate and individuals. Cardboard boxes made from superior quality materials are used in advertising paper materials. Quality cardboard boxes with high end colorings and printing make unique impressions on buyer and make the product so attractive that to make it most saleable product among all. Thus cardboard boxes have changed the way of packaging industry to emboss its importance in branding the product.</p>
<p align="justify]Few of the parameters keeping in mind while selecting the vendor for your cardboard boxes needs. The vendor must have good corporate client list to show it value and efforts building the reputation image in corporate world as a leader in packaging industry. The vendor must have good track record of providing the best quality materials and post sale services which is most important to retain long term business goals. The vendor should be a guiding leader to the custom requirements of industrial clients and must not follow the trend of quality compromise at any rate, just to pick orders. The vendor must provide the committed quality of cardboard boxes Paper labels are also used widely in packaging and promoting the products with variants like adhesive paper labels and non-adhesive paper labels.</p>

<p align="justify]Cardboard boxes are the paper materials or folding boxes, folding cartons made from high quality box material in packaging industry for Pharma products, consumer and FMCG products. Previous years, only brand products brought the high market value. But now the scenario has changed. People believe in something new and creative and expecting every time new flavor in the product and packaging. People believe in some extra-ordinary product changes. Thus companies are altering and opting various packaging and branding tools to make the product more innovative and attractive to capture more market share. Offset printing with varieties of colors and techniques to print elegantly on cardboard boxes to create and give unique look to packaging box in different style, size and shape. If you are looking for high quality standard packaging material, with international standard graphics on offset printing, visit - http://www.on-linegraphics.com and meet the branding experts that will help you out all the way for best product promotions.</p>

Cardboard Boxes, Folding Boxes, Folding Cartons, Pharmaceuti

Cardboard Boxes – Essential for Safe Packaging<br>
<br>
Cardboard boxes are used in various industries for packaging products. The main motive of packaging products is to ensure their safety until they reach the end consumers. There are many different types of products like pharmaceutical products, if not packed properly can get spoilt. Thus, in packaging, cardboard boxes are very much important and it becomes essential that they are of best quality if you need to ensure safe packaging. There are many companies who are into import and export business, so they always require safe and secure packaging while importing and exporting the products. High quality Cardboard boxes are available in various sizes and you can buy them depending on the product you need to pack. Not only for safety, the cardboard boxes if designed in an appealing manner can attract many customers. The cardboard boxes can also build your brand identity. In many rural places, where people are illiterate, cannot read what is written on the packing, they just recognize the product with the help of attractive paper labels stuck on its cardboard box or traditional offset printing done on the folding carton. There are various benefits of packing products in cardboard boxes also known as folding cartons as given below:-</p>
<ul>
<li>The brand can be easily advertised on the body of the cardboard box. Rather than simple brown box, you can get a cardboard box designed with logo and product name printed on it with attractive design which will attract your customers and can build your brand too.</li>
<li>The packaging of products in cardboard boxes is pretty much environment friendly as unlike plastic packing, these boxes can be recycled.</li>
<li>Cardboard boxes can be used for heavy materials like television and light materials like cosmetic cream also. The cardboard boxes can be designed in different shapes and sizes, depending on the product you need to pack. </li>
<li>Whether the products are pharmaceuticals, cosmetics, food or beverages, cardboard boxes keep those products hygienic and safe to be used by the consumers. </li>
</ul>
<p>If you require cardboard boxes of high quality, you need to contact creative professionals like http://www.on-linegraphics.com who can understand your packaging requirements very well and can design strong, sturdy and attractive cardboard boxes for your products.
</p>

Offset Printing Technology - Multi Color Printing, Single Co

Advantages of Offset Printing<br>
<br>
Offset printing is a traditional printing technology which is very much beneficial when printing in mass volume is to be done. With the help of offset printing the jobs can be done with accuracy, consistency and above all, quickly. There are various advantages given below due to which, leading printing and packaging company use offset printing technology for completing printing on folding cartons, labels, promotional material, calendars, leaflets etc.</p>
<ul>
<li>Offset printing is quite economical as inks are used efficiently without any wastage. Instead of spraying the inks, the image and inks are transferred from a rubber plate to the blanket roller and finally on the material on which printing is to be done.</li>
<li>Ultimate use of resources is done if traditional offset printing is applied into a project. This process of printing avoids the ink wastage and thus is very much beneficial if printing in high volume is required.</li>
<li>The offset printing gives best results in terms of sharpness and crispiness. This process is integrated with four color in which rich color coating is done and so offset printing is just perfect when photo reproductions are done or promotional material like colorful paper labels for a company are being printed.</li>
<li>The packaging on any product requires high quality so that consumers are attracted towards the product. Offset printing provides that kind of quality in which high definition printing jobs can be accomplished successfully.</li>
<li>With the help of offset printing, you can print a wide range of printing and packaging material like different types of folding boxes, brochures, leaflets, flyers, letter heads, newsletters etc.</li>
<li>Offset printing can make customized printing possible, as you can also design your own print product and run through the process of offset printing.</li>
<li>This traditional printing process enables printing in very less turnaround time which is not possible with digital printing which saves lot of your time.</li>
</ul>
<p>Thus, offset printing not only saves your money but it also saves your time and also gives the output of excellent printing quality. The best thing about offset printing is that it is the most economical and practical way of completing printing jobs. For more information on offset printing, visit http://www.on-linegraphics.com.
</p>

Importance of offset printing in Brand development and marke

Offset printing is one of the most important tool to present you products in better way. Product offset printing is the direct marketing tool where you are not only putting the products details but you are marketing the product and making a brand name product through printing. It is the direct marketing where product itself says something about it and if it is presented in attractive way, the product becomes the most sellable and consumer lure to grab the product. Many branded products have captured the market through this way only.</p>
<p align="justify] Printing on various product labels, cardboard boxes is to give value additions to the product packaging. Offset printing is an effective way of bulk printing with quality and high resolution print in short duration. Offset printing is widely used with advanced machineries to give better printing effects along with images and fonts with different colors and sizes. The offset ink plays vital role in effective printing. Good quality ink always gives better results and high quality printing that remains for long term without alteration of weather conditions. </p>
<p align="justify] Offset printing is used in wide printing applications of business visiting cards printing, flyers, banners, catalogs and posters. Creativity and cost effective printing both can be achieved with standard offset printing machinery. It is considered as a root in packaging industry that has become the base of product marketing in modern days.</p>
<p align="justify] Cardboard boxes for packaging the pharmaceutical, consumer and FMCG products run parallel with offset printing for good marketing strategy. High quality cardboard boxes save the products from dusting and all types of weather effects. Even they provide the best media for promoting the product by offset printing them with better fonts, size and color to give a new look to the product. </p>

<p align="justify] Previously both the box and printing were used only for packaging the product but now the concept has been changed to promote the product itself with better quality packaging material used to display. Thus offset printing has a unique role in brand development and market the product at local and international level. If you are concerned with packaging industries and in need of good quality packaging materials, visit the website – http://www.on-linegraphics.com, where you can get plenty of information to decorate the product in new ways under the assistance of brand forming experts.</p>
